newsitem.title: USA: CENTRAL U.S. CARLOT BEEF TRADE 1500 CDT - USDA.
newsitem.headline: CENTRAL U.S. CARLOT BEEF TRADE 1500 CDT - USDA.

text.p: Utility carcasses steady compared to same period last week. Demand moderate on moderate to heavy offerings. - USDA
COW & BULL CARCASS FOB OMAHA 6.0 Loads Reported.
Lds Price Range Latest Estb. Mkt.

BONELESS PROCESSING BEEF/BEEF TRIMMINGS 190.0 Loads Reported. Fresh lean boneless beef $3.50-5.00 lower; 75% 1.00 lower; 65% 4.50-5.00 lower compared to last test. Demand light on heavy offerings. Beef trimmings lower early on fairly good demand and heavy offerings. FOB OMAHA BASIS: Chm Ln Lds Price Range Wtavg
FOB EAST TEXAS AND OKLAHOMA: Chm Ln Lds Price Range Wtavg
CAF NORTHEAST AREAS: Chm Ln Lds Price Range Wtavg
**ABCDE after quotes represents days since last actual market test. Quotes are dropped after 5 days of no test or before if they no longer reflect current market conditions.**
